content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), offshore pump(position x=106.5, y=-32.5), and pipe-groups(positions x=107.5, y=-34.5 and x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Iron plate production at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of stone furnace(position x=60.0, y=-60.0) and transport belts(positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace is not full before inserting items
### Errors when using boiler
- Ensure the boiler has enough fuel before using it
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine has enough steam before using it

### NAMESPACE
* `insert_item`: function to insert items into entities, invoked 8 times with 100% success rate
* `mine_resource`: function to mine resources, invoked 8 times with 100% success rate
* `get_entity_status`: function to get entity status, invoked 24 times with 100% success rate
* Important variables:
  - `inventory`: dictionary of current inventory, updated 8 times
  - `entities`: list of entities on the map, updated 8 times
  - `resources`: list of resources on the map, updated 8 times
